long_description: through zillow, we fell in love with a hundred acre farm with a hundred year old farm house surrounded by enormous oak trees. we use only organic insecticides and fertilizers in our garden or pastures and grow only certified organic produce. farming has been an adventure. on the pastures at sylvan farm, we raise certified animal welfare approved pork and beef.
business_tags: oak trees | certified organic | grass fed | large gardens | leafy greens | family farm | high tunnel | care farming | farm house | photos from the farm | outbuildings | pork and beef | fruit and vegetables | animal welfare | land management | logo & branding
generated_description: sylvan farm is a family-owned farm located in saluda county, south carolina. the farm spans 60 acres and focuses on sustainable agricultural practices. it raises certified animal welfare approved pork and beef, as well as certified grass fed cattle. the farm also cultivates usda certified organic fruits, vegetables, and herbs in its two large high tunnels and a 5-acre field. sylvan farm emphasizes the use of organic insecticides and fertilizers and follows principles of land management and rotation to promote the health of both animals and land. the farm is actively involved in the community, with family members contributing to its operations.
generated_business_tags: certified grass-fed cows | ssustainable farming practices | animal welfare approved pork | land rotation management | usda certified organic fruits and vegetables
